name: Sheriff Shootout
description:
Choose your action during 'Ready' or 'Aim', and it will be executed at 'Fire!'

First to 3 points wins. A point will be earned when successfully shooting an opponent or blocking an opponent's shot. If both players score 3 points at the same time, whoever breaks the tie wins.

A player cannot move to a spot occupied by a snake.

A player must have at least 1 bullet to shoot.

Controls:

Player 1:

W - Up, S - Down,  A - Block,  D - Shoot, Q - Load

Player 2:

Up Arrow - Up, Down Arrow - Down, Right Arrow - Block, Left Arrow - Shoot, Shift - Load
